breakfast.name: Intercontinental Hotel Restaurant
breakfast.notes: In-hotel dining after observation deck visit, jet-lag friendly

lunch.name: Chongqing Noodles (重庆小面)
lunch.location: Yuzhong District near Huguang Guild Hall
lunch.notes: Local specialty, NOT hotpot as requested, near Xiayuan Li area

dinner.name: Nanshan Hotpot with Night View
dinner.location: Nanshan Street, Zhenwu Mountain 88, South Bank District
dinner.notes: MUST: Nanshan hillside location with Chongqing night view, not riverside. Reserve in advance for window seat

breakfast.name: Train breakfast or family home
breakfast.notes: Early train departure, simple meal

lunch.name: Family home cooking
lunch.notes: Family meal, no cost

dinner.name: Chinese New Year family banquet
dinner.notes: Family celebration meal, no cost

breakfast.name: 老五酱肉包子
breakfast.notes: MUST: Most authentic Bazhong breakfast, family recommendation

lunch.name: 清真老七牛肉
lunch.notes: MUST: Bazhong specialty beef, before train departure

dinner.name: Taikoo Li area restaurant
dinner.notes: Evening stroll in Taikoo Li, casual dinner near home

breakfast.name: 明婷饭店 (Mingting Restaurant)
breakfast.notes: MUST: One of 3 required restaurants, authentic Sichuan breakfast/brunch

lunch.name: 饕林餐厅 (Taolin Restaurant)
lunch.location: 春熙路店 or 太古里天仙桥店, Chengdu
lunch.notes: MUST: One of 3 required restaurants, after Panda Base and Jinli visit

dinner.name: 牛丞丞 (Niu Chengcheng) - Early dinner
dinner.notes: MUST: Third required restaurant, early dinner before 14:35 flight. May need to eat around 12:00-13:00

breakfast.name: Baker & Spice
breakfast.notes: Quality breakfast near French Concession, INFJ-friendly atmosphere

lunch.name: 人和馆 (Ren He Guan)
lunch.location: 肇嘉浜路407号 or 愚园路142号静安寺店, Shanghai
lunch.notes: MUST: Michelin-recommended Shanghai local cuisine, authentic flavors

dinner.name: AJIYA炭火烧肉
dinner.location: 江宁路445号时美大厦402室 (Jing'an Store)
dinner.notes: MUST: Premium Japanese BBQ, reserve in advance

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast
breakfast.location: SK Luxury Hotel Houxi, Nanjing Road
breakfast.notes: Early start for Disneyland, convenient in-hotel option

total_budget.notes: Total cost is within reasonable range for 2 people over 21 days. Shanghai and Beijing have higher costs due to Michelin dining requirements. Bazhong costs low due to family meals. Daily average includes all three meals.

notes: All restaurant recommendations based on Gaode Maps POI searches and Google Maps data. Key requirements met: Day 1 Nanshan hillside hotpot with view (NOT riverside), Day 3 老五酱肉包子 and 老七牛肉 in Bazhong (confirmed addresses), Day 4 all three Chengdu restaurants (明婷饭店, 牛丞丞, 饕林), Day 5 人和馆 and AJIYA in Shanghai. Michelin-level dining included for Shanghai days. Beijing meals focused on local exploration with budget-conscious options during apartment settling period. RedNote verification unavailable due to Playwright installation issues, but all restaurants verified through Gaode Maps and Google Maps with ratings and locations. For Days 9-21 in Beijing, specific restaurant names depend on final rental apartment location (TBD). Cost estimates are per person in USD, suitable for couple travel.
